blade-of-dawn.name: Blade of Dawn
blade-of-dawn.damage: 2D12 (melee weapon, uses MIT + AST to hit)
blade-of-dawn.description: Summon a sword of condensed light into your hands. The blade hums with radiant energy and strikes as a melee weapon dealing 2D12 damage using your MIT + AST for attack rolls. The weapon persists until dismissed or you rest.

searing-ray.name: Searing Ray
searing-ray.description: Focus light through your fingertips into a concentrated beam that burns through flesh and armor. Make a ranged spell attack against a creature within 40 ft, dealing 2D10 + AST damage.

luminous-edge.name: Luminous Edge
luminous-edge.description: Infuse an existing weapon with radiant energy. For 3 rounds the weapon's damage rolls gain +3D8 additional damage.

lance-of-radiance.name: Lance of Radiance
lance-of-radiance.damage: 3D10 (ranged weapon, uses SPD + AST to hit)
lance-of-radiance.description: Conjure a spear of pure sunlight that returns to your hand after each throw. Attacks with the lance use SPD + AST for attack rolls and deal 3D10 damage. The spear persists until dismissed or you rest.

empowered-strike.name: Empowered Strike
empowered-strike.damage: doubles damage dice of next attack
empowered-strike.description: Channel concentrated light into your next attack. Within 1 minute, the next qualifying attack you make rolls double its normal damage dice. Works with light weapons or weapons currently enchanted with radiant effects.

solar-arsenal.name: Solar Arsenal
solar-arsenal.damage: Each dagger attack deals 2D8 (uses AST to hit)
solar-arsenal.description: Summon three light daggers that orbit you. On your turns you may spend 1 AP per dagger to make individual attacks (2D8 damage each, using AST for attack rolls) against targets within 30 ft. Daggers remain until destroyed or you rest.

radiant-fury.name: Radiant Fury
radiant-fury.damage: +2D12 radiant damage on weapon attacks; blinds on crits
radiant-fury.description: Empower an ally's weapon with blinding radiance. For 3 rounds the weapon's attacks deal +2D12 radiant damage. On critical hits, targets are Blinded.

corona-strike.name: Corona Strike
corona-strike.description: Become a vessel of pure light and deliver a devastating melee blow. The primary target takes 6D12 + MIT + AST damage. All enemies within 15 ft of the target take 3D10 radiant damage and are Blinded for 1 round.

shield-of-light.name: Shield of Light
shield-of-light.description: Raise a barrier of solid radiance. The target gains +2 D20 on defensive rolls for 2 rounds.

absorb-radiance.name: Absorb Radiance
absorb-radiance.damage: reduces incoming magic damage by 2D10; heal half amount reduced
absorb-radiance.description: Draw incoming magical energy into yourself, converting hostile magic into sustaining light. Reduce magic damage taken by 2D10 and heal HP equal to half the amount reduced.

guardians-glow.name: Guardian's Glow
guardians-glow.description: A soft aura surrounds you, warning of danger. You cannot be surprised, and the first attack against you each combat deals 1D10 less damage.

bulwark-of-dawn.name: Bulwark of Dawn
bulwark-of-dawn.description: Erect a 10 ft-wide barrier of crystallized light. Enemies that attack through it take 2D8 radiant damage. The barrier lasts for 3 rounds.

interpose.name: Interpose
interpose.description: Step between an adjacent ally and harm, becoming the target of the attack instead. Damage you take from that attack is reduced by 2D12.
interpose.notes: Protection reaction, trades position for reduced damage

aegis-of-the-sun.name: Aegis of the Sun
aegis-of-the-sun.damage: 50 temporary HP; adjacent attackers take 1D8 radiant
aegis-of-the-sun.description: Radiance wraps around you as armor. Gain 50 temporary HP that is lost before normal HP. While the aegis persists, attackers within 5 ft take 1D8 radiant damage when they hit you.

sanctuary-of-radiance.name: Sanctuary of Radiance
sanctuary-of-radiance.description: Call forth a 20 ft-radius dome of pure light centered on you. Allies inside gain +3 D20 on defensive rolls and resistance to all damage (damage halved). Enemies cannot enter. The dome lasts 3 rounds, and you cannot move while maintaining it.

cleansing-light.name: Cleansing Light
cleansing-light.description: Wash an ally in gentle radiance that burns away afflictions without harming flesh. Remove one curse, poison, or disease from the target.

mending-glow.name: Mending Glow
mending-glow.description: Channel soft healing light into a creature you touch, restoring 2D8 HP.

purifying-beam.name: Purifying Beam
purifying-beam.description: Fire a lance of sanctified light that sears corruption. The target takes 2D10 + AST damage, plus an additional 1D10 damage if they are undead or otherwise corrupted. Range 30 ft.
purifying-beam.notes: Radiant attack with bonus vs undead/corrupted

dispel-darkness.name: Dispel Darkness
dispel-darkness.damage: 2D8 radiant to Void casters in area
dispel-darkness.description: Drive back unnatural shadows and the magic that spawned them. End one magical darkness or shadow-based effect in a 30 ft radius. Void or shadow magic users in the area suffer 2D8 radiant damage.

restore-clarity.name: Restore Clarity
restore-clarity.description: Burn away mental contamination with focused radiance. Remove Confused, Charmed, Terrified, or similar mental conditions from a target within 30 ft.

cascade-of-purity.name: Cascade of Purity
cascade-of-purity.description: Light pours outward in a wave, touching all allies in a 20 ft radius. Each ally is cleansed of one negative condition and heals 2D10 HP.

searing-judgment.name: Searing Judgment
searing-judgment.damage: 4D12 + AST ( +2D12 vs undead/demons/corrupted ) and 1 Burned stack
searing-judgment.description: Concentrate righteous light into a devastating ray. The target takes 4D12 + AST damage, plus an extra 2D12 against undead, demons, or corrupted targets, and gains 1 stack of Burned. Range 40 ft.

radiant-absolution.name: Radiant Absolution
radiant-absolution.damage: Enemies: 5D10 radiant ( +3D10 vs undead/corrupted ); allies heal 3D10
radiant-absolution.description: Call down a pillar of absolute light that purges all darkness from an area. All enemies in a 25 ft radius take 5D10 radiant damage. Undead and corrupted enemies take an additional 3D10 damage and must make a COR check (Difficulty 45) or be destroyed instantly. All negative conditions on allies in the area are removed, and allies heal 3D10 HP.
radiant-absolution.notes: Mass cleanse and devastating anti-undead strike
